subdomain.title: Subdomain
subdomain.description: The subdomain for your Zendesk Talk.

access_token.title: Access Token
access_token.description: The value of the API token generated. See the docs for more information.

email.title: Email
email.description: The user email for your Zendesk account.

start_date.title: Replication Start Date
start_date.description: The date from which you'd like to replicate data for Zendesk Talk API, in the format YYYY-MM-DDT00:00:00Z.
